title: [Large-Scale] Customized Science Learning Design Program for Adult Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Lacking or possessing only elementary-level foundational science knowledge
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education emphasizing work relevance for current practitioners, optimized for smartphone-based learning activities

learning_goals: Learners can apply data analysis skills in scientific problem-solving processes to real workplace scenarios.
Learners develop a self-directed learning plan utilizing digital content (videos, infographics) and text materials at least 70% of the time.

Learners form teams of 3-4 members biweekly to explain 10-minute oral presentations of project results applying scientific concepts (e.g., thermodynamics, fluid mechanics) to real industrial problems (e.g., energy efficiency improvement), and achieve 80+ points on an evaluation rubric (content accuracy 30%, applicability 30%, delivery 40%)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
